BaseRules: Summer Lucky Star rewards can only be drawn once. Spend Celica Lottery Tickets to participate in the event, and drawn a certain number of times to earn additional rewards.
Complete event missions during the event to obtain Celica Lottery Tickets. The tickets will be automatically recycled after the event ends.
Wandering Waves rewards can only be drawn once. Spend Water Park Pass to participate in the event, and drawn a certain number of times to earn additional rewards.
Complete event missions during the event to obtain Water Park Pass. The tickets will be automatically recycled after the event ends.
